title: Newzald: from Moleskine to Markert
content:
The story behind Kris Sowersby's Newzald. An interesting insight into the processes involved.

[Newzald: from Moleskine to Markert](http://web.archive.org/web/20110928174247/http:/ilovetypography.com/2008/03/12/newzald-moleskine-to-market/)
author: John Boardley
